sqlquery.name: SQL_firstProblemHistory
sqlquery.select: select t.PROBLEM_ID as pId, t.PROBLEM_TYPE as pType, t.PROBLEM_NOTE as pNote, t.CREATE_TIME as pTime, t.PROBLEM_REASON as pReason, t.PROBLEM_WHETHERCLOSE as pClose from APP_PROBLEM_HISTORY t where 1=1 and t.state = 1 and t.PROBLEM_WHETHERCLOSE='1' #con_group# order by t.CREATE_TIME desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_firstMonitorBulletin
sqlquery.select:
select t.MONITOR_BULLETIN_ID as mId, t.TITLE as mTitle, t.CREATE_TIME as mTime, t.CREATE_USER as mUser, t.NOTE as mNote, t.IS_CLOSE as mClose
from APP_MONITOR_BULLETIN t where 1=1 and t.state = 1 and t.IS_CLOSE=1 #con_group# order by t.CREATE_TIME desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_firstPhoneComplain
sqlquery.select: select t.PHONE_COMPLAIN_ID as phId, t.COMPLAIN_OBJ as phObj, t.CREATE_NAME as phName, t.RESULT as phResult, t.CREATE_TIME as phCreateTime, t.COMPLAIN_NOTE as phNote from APP_PHONE_COMPLAIN t where 1=1 and t.state=1 and t.RESULT=1 #con_group# order by t.CREATE_TIME desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_userBelongGroupid
sqlquery.select: select g.c1 as groupId from {UltraProcess:SysGroup} g,{UltraProcess:SysGroupUser} gu where g.c1 = gu.c620000027 and gu.c620000028 = '#userId#' and (g.c630000021 = 0 or g.c630000021 = 3 or g.c630000021 = 4)
